specification.title: Dove Conditioner Hairfall Rescue
specification.summary: Beat the heat with the refreshing Orange Tang. Enjoy its yummy taste with the benefits of Vitamin A, B and C and Iron. Rejuvenate your day by drinking a glass full of fresh and energetic drink- which gives you 60 percent of your Vitamin C requirement of the day.Tang makes water more fun to drink ensuring that your family stays hydrated – a glass of Tang gives your child vitamins required for the entire day. No need to add sugar, just add the powder to water and enjoy the delicious drink on the go
